title: 72/126. Observer status for the ASEAN+3 Macroeconomic Research Office in the General Assembly
text:
United Nations 
A/RES/72/126
 
 
General Assembly 
Distr.: General 
18 December 2017 
 
17-22171 (E)    201217  
*1722171* 
 
 
Seventy-second session 
Agenda item 171 
 
 
 
 
 Resolution adopted by the General Assembly 
on 7 December 2017 
 
 
 
 
[on the report of the Sixth Committee (A/72/474)] 
 
 
 72/126. Observer status for the ASEAN+3 Macroeconomic Research Office 
in the General Assembly 
 
 
 
The General Assembly, 
 
Wishing to promote cooperation between the United Nations and the ASEAN+3 
Macroeconomic Research Office, 
 
1. 
Decides to invite the ASEAN+3 Macroeconomic Research Office to 
participate in the sessions and the work of the General Assembly in the capacity of 
observer; 
 
2. 
Requests the Secretary-General to take the action necessary to implement 
the present resolution. 
 
67th plenary meeting  
7 December 2017

paragraphs.1: Decides to invite the ASEAN+3 Macroeconomic Research Office to participate in the sessions and the work of the General Assembly in the capacity of observer;
paragraphs.2: Requests the Secretary-General to take the action necessary to implement the present resolution. 67th plenary meeting 7 December 2017
